summary: A drama centered on a young woman who claims she was the target of an anti-Semetic attack and the subsequent media sensation it creates.
cast: Émilie Dequenne|Michel Blanc|Catherine Deneuve|Mathieu Demy|Ronit Elkabetz|Nicolas Duvauchelle|Jérémie Quaegebeur|Djibril Pavadé|Alain Cauchi|Amer Alwan|Mélaine Leconte|Raphaëline Goupilleau|Arnaud Valois|Bruno Mary|Jessica Borio|Benoît Solès|Shoshana Lok|Bertrand Soulier|David Barbas|Myriam Charleins|Lahcen Elmazouzi|Jenny Rieu|Estelle Simon|Grégoire Taulère
title: La chica del tren
